briefTitle: A Study to Investigate the Long-term Safety, Tolerability, and Efficacy of Rozanolixizumab in Adult Patients With Generalized Myasthenia Gravis
officialTitle: A Randomized, Open-Label Extension Study to Investigate the Long-Term Safety, Tolerability, and Efficacy of Rozanolixizumab in Adult Patients With Generalized Myasthenia Gravis
summary: The purpose of the MycarinGstudy is to evaluate the long-term safety, tolerability and long-term efficacy of rozanolixizumab in study participants with generalized myasthenia gravis (MG).

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Treatment-emergent Adverse Events (TEAEs)
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: From Baseline until End of Study (up to Week 60)
